long_description: The ultimate relief for dog-tired, beat-up feet, Sorbothane Sorbo Air Insoles provide 3 layers of soft cushioning for all-day comfort in athletic shoes. High-performance insoles absorb shock and cushion for court sports such as basketball and tennis, and for running, walking and post-workout relief. Air-infused Sorbothane layer absorbs up to 94.7% of impact shock, reducing impact-related injuries, jarring, fatigue and pain, while adding comfort. Nonslip, antifungal foam layer cushions and rebounds to original shape; brushed polyester fabric top layer adds comfort and extra moisture wicking. Overstock.
short_description: The ultimate relief for dog-tired, beat-up feet, Sorbothane Sorbo Air Insoles provide 3 layers of soft cushioning for all-day comfort in athletic shoes.
